segments.text: Nice to meet you here.How come you dropped into this company today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My boss sent me here to take some business documents back to his office . I didn't know you were working here.What a surprise.How long have you been doing this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is great.Do you have to work the night shift ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , in most cases I don't have to unless there is something urgent to deal with . I work five days a week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is hard to say.But I've to start by working as a trainee before I really become an experienced marketing assistant.Sometimes , I am really under great pressure when it gets busy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take it easy . I'm sure you will gain enough experience while working as a marketing assistant . I hope you haven't been given much trouble in the job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Luckily not.The silent I meet are generally very friendly and have a good boss .
segments.speaker: S1
